summary: Email correspondence between Assistant U.S. Attorney Maurene Comey and defense attorney Daniel J. Kaiser regarding the Epstein case in the Southern District of New York. The emails discuss scheduling a follow-up call and express appreciation for a previous meeting.

persons.name: Daniel J. Kaiser
persons.context: Defense attorney from Kaiser Saurborn & Mair, P.C. who is being contacted by the U.S. Attorney's office regarding the Epstein case. He thanks the team for handling a meeting professionally.

persons.name: Kimberly
persons.context: Recipient of an email along with Daniel J. Kaiser regarding scheduling a call about the Epstein case.

persons.name: William H. Kaiser
persons.context: Copied on an email from Daniel J. Kaiser regarding the Epstein case, likely a colleague or associate.

persons.name: Maurene Comey
persons.context: Assistant U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York who is coordinating with defense counsel regarding the Epstein case, scheduling follow-up communications.

connections.description: Prosecutor and defense attorney communicating about the Epstein case, scheduling meetings and follow-up calls.
Colleagues copied on the same email regarding the Epstein case, suggesting they work together at Kaiser Saurborn & Mair, P.C.

events.title: Meeting between prosecution and defense teams
events.description: A meeting occurred between the U.S. Attorney's office and defense counsel regarding the Epstein case, which was followed up with appreciation and scheduling of further communication.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was actively communicating with defense counsel regarding the Epstein case in July 2019.
A meeting took place around July 13, 2019, between prosecution and defense teams, which was described as handled professionally.
Assistant U.S. Attorney Maurene Comey was seeking to schedule a follow-up call with defense attorney Daniel J. Kaiser and Kimberly.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal proceedings and coordination between parties involved in the Epstein case.
